meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting lines on a map connecting points receiving equal amounts of rainfall.
meanings.sent1: The isohyetal map showed areas with the same rainfall.
meanings.sent2: The isohyetal regions received equal rain throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The isohyetal line threw a rain party for all the points it connected.
meanings.sent4: Her umbrella acted like an isohyetal shield against the downpour.
meanings.sent5: The isohyetal concept painted a clear picture of rainfall distribution.

meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points receiving equal amounts of rainfall.
meanings.sent1: The isohyetal on the map linked areas with matching rainfall levels.
meanings.sent2: The isohyetal helped meteorologists analyze rainfall patterns.
meanings.sent3: The isohyetal whispered secrets of rainfall equality to the other map lines.
meanings.sent4: The isohyetal acted as a bridge between rainy and dry regions.
meanings.sent5: The isohyetal line stood out on the map like a ruler of rain.
